update.releaseNotes: v.4.8.0 - UPDATED - Sensor text values can be User-Defined in Edit Device Dialog Screen. UPDATED - Improved Tasmota Device and Sensor Recognition, many more devices and sensors supported. UPDATED - Qty of visible MEM values can be set for individual devices (see Edit Device Dialog Screen). CHANGED - Text sizes increased slightly for all sensors values. CHANGED - Database and TAS file format has been changed. (Older TAS files are still supported) v.4.8.1 - BUGFIX - RGB LED and Power Monitor Crash bug fixed.
